extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Ballot> createBallots​(java.util.HashMap<Candidate,java.util.ArrayList<Ballot>> candidates)
      Parses the ballot files, finds the Candidates running in the election, and creates Ballot Objects for each ballot contained in the files.

      Sorts through the created ballots and remove any ballots that have less than half of the candidates ranked

    • Constructor Detail

      • BallotGenerator

        public BallotGenerator​(java.lang.String inFileLocation,
                       boolean inShuffle,
                       java.lang.String inElectionType)
        Constructor for the Ballot Generator class.
        Parameters:
        inFileLocation - is where the user stored the ballot files
        inShuffle - is true unless the user specified that the shuffle should be off
        inElectionType - is a string that shows if it is an STV or Plurality election

    • Method Detail

      • createBallots

        public java.util.ArrayList<Ballot> createBallots​(java.util.HashMap<Candidate,java.util.ArrayList<Ballot>> candidates)
        Parses the ballot files, finds the Candidates running in the election, and creates Ballot Objects for each ballot contained in the files.
        Parameters:
        candidates - empty HashMap representing unelected candidates and their associated votes to be filled.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of ballot objects representing all ballots in the files.

      • invalidator

        public void invalidator​(java.util.ArrayList<STVBallot> allBallots)
        Sorts through the created ballots and remove any ballots that have less than half of the candidates ranked
        Parameters:
        allBallots - ArrayList of all STVballots created by ballot generator

      • invalidBallotReport

        public void invalidBallotReport​(java.util.ArrayList<STVBallot> invalidBallots,
                                int validBallotCount)
        Creates a new file and writes to that file a report of the invalidated ballots and prints out statistics regarding the percentage of invalidated ballots, ratio, and the number of invalidated ballots. Prints out information on each individual invalidated ballot as well.
        Parameters:
        invalidBallots - ArrayList of all invalidated ballots.
        validBallotCount - int of the number of valid ballots.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle​(java.util.ArrayList<Ballot> ballots,
                    int numBallots)
        Shuffles the given array 1000 times.
        Parameters:
        ballots - ArrayList of ballot objects to be shuffled.
        numBallots - Number of ballots in the ArrayList.
